ygData.subject: Re: Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes big difference. Check eqvault for an essay on it, here are the basics: Earth: Hits hard, slow, most hps Fire: Hits hardest, fastest, fewest hps Water: Hits
ygData.messageBody:
Yes big difference. Check eqvault for an essay on it, here are the basics:

Earth: Hits hard, slow, most hps
Fire: Hits hardest, fastest, fewest hps
Water: Hits weakest, not fast, many hps and high regen rate
Air: Hits weak, fast, high agi, not many hps

That is a -rough- breakdown, I haven't read the essay for a while and
haven't been a Mage for awhile either, but that is pretty much how it goes.
I liked Waters the best for solo tanking. Good luck!

----- Original Message -----
From: Sarah <sarpetals@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 11, 1999 9:04 PM
Subject: [EQCheats] Pets


: From: "Sarah" <sarpetals@...>
:
: Is there really a difference between the fire, water, earth, and air pets
or
: are they all equally strong? Does anyone prefer one over the other, and
if
: yes, why?
